title: When open the webpage https://www.alibaba.com/ , the login icon on the right cannot appear
content: Hello! Due to work reasons, we need to use Fiirefox 54.0.1 (64) and do not need to upgrade But When open the webpage https://www.alibaba.com/ , the login icon on the right cannot appear I searched carefully online but couldn't find a solution Please provide a solution Can you provide an email address? I can take a screenshot to illustrate the situation My email address bestfinder@foxmail.com thank you HALE
creator: bestfinder11.11

title: Odd icons show up on desktop
content:
About once a week or more, a very small FF icon will appear on my desktop after startup. It will have a string of letters under it, like this one: hqWyUevN . I have never clicked on these things and always pitch them into the trash bin. But I do wonder what it is, what it means, and if it's a security issue of some sort.

Please speak slowly and use simple words. I'm not all that tech savvy.

Thanks!
creator: mwhite139

title: Vetical Tabs
content:
On the latest update to firefox, the browser now has a vetical tab in addition to the horizontal ones. I want to remove the vertical tabs, and ideally for it to never come back. I've searched the settings as well as the support features and can't find a way to turn it off. I am legitimately not going to use firefox at all until this issue is resolved.

Thanks
creator: xxxtrastuf

title: Startpage installing itself
content:
Find that at each update, the Startpage search engine is re-installed WITHOUT my permission. I understand startpage can be defined as a PUP, and I don't trust it. The most aggravating thing is that installing add-ons and extentions without users' permission is unconscionable.

Would like to know if there is any way I can block the reinstallation of this at each update.

Thanks.
creator: sra97

title: Activar letras en menú contextual
content:
Buenas! Tengo una pc con linux que al hacer click derecho me aparecen letras de acceso rápido del menú contextual (el que se despliega al hacer click derecho), entonces si quiero inspeccionar un elemento hago click derecho sobre él y presiono Q y ya se abre el inspector, eso me ahorra tiempo en recorrer el menú, pero tengo otra pc macOs con firefox pero no hace lo mismo, busqué soluciones pero no encontré.

Como puedo hacer que firefox en mac haga lo mismo? Muchas gracias!
creator: lucasleoneldl

title: Facebook attachments
content: I'm having much difficulty in attaching a article I see to Facebook. Its possible the problem may be I'm not using the right instruction on the Firefox options when I right click the article I want to attach to Facebook. Some of those options are, Save link as, Copy link, when I right click for options. Can someone explain what is the right option to use? And, how do I proceed once I choose the correct option to make that attachment to a Facebook message I'm replying to? There are times a picture of the article will attach to the Facebook message, but the text that is associated with the attachment will not appear? Can someone please help? Thank you.
creator: sciencemagic
